# The `AttributeMask` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This class stores enough information to efficiently remove some attributes from an existing AttrBuilder, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/attributeset">AttributeSet</a> or AttributeList. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>class llvm::AttributeMask</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

This class stores enough information to efficiently remove some attributes from an existing AttrBuilder, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/attributeset">AttributeSet</a> or AttributeList.
